University of Minnesota
General Extension Division
Minneapolis 14
Radio Station KUOM
770 ON YOUR DIAL
July 17, 19S0
Mr. Seymour N. Siegel
Municipal Broadcasting System—WNYC
Municipal Building
New York 7, N. Y.
Dear Sy:
Last week I received a letter from Keith
Tyler asking me to get in a report on the panel
I arranged at Columbus.
Could you get me a page and a half summary
of what you said so that it can be put in the
IER Proceedings?
Burton Paulu
Manager of KUOM
1851
1951
• FOUNDED IN THE FAITH THAT MEN ARE ENNOBLED BY UNDERSTANDING •
DEDICATED TO THE ADVANCEMENT OF LEARNING AND THE SEARCH FOR TRUTH
DEVOTED TO THE INSTRUCTION OF YOUTH AND THE WELFARE OF THE STATE
